tool.name: EggNOG DB Download
tool.help:
This tool downloads eggnog data using download_eggnog_data.py and populates the data tables: eggnog_mapper_db_versioned. The data is located at: http://eggnog5.embl.de/download/emapperdb-5.0.0/ can vary from 1G to 80G in size.
This will install data relative to the galaxy_data_manager_data_path declared in config/galaxy.yml in directory eggnog_data/<eggnog data version>/. The eggnog version is queried from the downloaded SQlite eggnog.db from table version.
